pr_title: HDDS-4024. Avoid while loop too soon when exception happen

timeline.message: HDDS-4024. Avoid while loop too soon when exception happen

timeline.bodyText: Now that sleep is moved outside this try, I think interrupted state needs to be restored here.  Otherwise if execute is interrupted, this catch clears interrupted state and the thread will sleep below.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: @adoroszlai Thanks for review. I have updated the patch.
